about_the_game:
Coloring Game: Girls 2 is a sequel to the double anti-stress game (coloring by numbers plus beautiful girls).

  • 30 images (1,300,000 pixels)

  • user-friendly and intuitive interface;

  • several coloring modes (pencil, paint bucket).
detailed_description:
Coloring Game: Girls 2 is a sequel to the double anti-stress game (coloring by numbers plus beautiful girls).

  • 30 images (1,300,000 pixels)

  • user-friendly and intuitive interface;

  • several coloring modes (pencil, paint bucket).
name: Coloring Game: Girls 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 1000 MHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware support WebGL - OpenGL 2.1 (GPU Memory - 512MB)
  • Storage: 212 MB available space

short_description: Coloring Game: Girls 2 is a sequel to the double anti-stress game (coloring by numbers plus beautiful girls).
